EmailTemplate.name: June12Web: LinkedIn.Thank You for Attending
EmailTemplate.subject: Thank You for Attending our LinkedIn Webinar - Free Resources
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello {{lead.First Name:default=Webinar Registrant}},
Thank you for attending “LinkedIn for Independent Consultants: 5 Steps to Enhance Your Profile & Bring in More Clients.” We hope that you were able to pick up a few new tips to take advantage of all LinkedIn has to offer – particularly for independent consultants.
As a follow-up, we’d like to provide you with a few resources:
- Recorded webinar <http://www.mbopartners.com/webinar-linkedin-independent-consultants-5-steps-enhance-your-profile-bring-more-clients> - Webinar slide deck <http://www.mbopartners.com/sites/mbopartners.com/files/pdfs/mbo-linkedin-webinar-slides-6.28.12.pdf> - Webinar Q&A <http://www.mbopartners.com/blog/62812-linkedin-webinar-qa> - Melissa on LinkedIn <http://www.linkedin.com/profile/view?id=1408083&locale=en_US&trk=tyah> - Five Easy Ways to Grow Your LinkedIn Network <http://www.networksolutions.com/smallbusiness/2012/06/5-easy-ways-to-grow-your-linkedin-network/>
We invite you to sign-up <http://info.mbopartners.com/2012SeriesSignUp.html> to stay informed about future webinars in our series. If you have any topic recommendations or feedback, please email webinar@mbopartners.com <mailto:webinar@mbopartners.com>.
Thank you,
THE MBO MARKETING TEAM t: 1-800-220-0469 e: info@mbopartners.com
